name: Liam Gnzlz
text: Service there was great, can hold many patrons at once. Located on the outer part of the McGuire Joint Base, it's a great find with tasty pizza and ice-cold soft drinks. The employees were friendly and courteous, and we had a nice time out. 10/10, would go again!

name: MrHelpmeoprah
text: Arrived quicker than expected, was staying at the hotel on base though. Food was Pizza Hut usual. Delivery driver was nice. Guy answering the phone was kind enough to help me with the address being I had no idea where I was located besides …More

name: Sohum Gokhale
text: You cannot order pizza from here if you are a civilian.

name: bil margle
text: It's Pizza hut. Not much more to say. If you've been to a Pizza hut then you know what to expect. In my opinion it's good pizza, maybe not the best, but it's consistently good.

name: T H
text: Employees left me locked out. I came here TDY and placed my order 40 minutes prior to them closing. I walked 15 minutes there and had to knock for several minutes to get someone to open the door for me.

text: Good but didnt really like what I ordered personally the pzone does not have enough sauce and was quite dry. Other than that great service and hot when delivered.
